argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | deg1addle.y | |- Y = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | deg1addle.d | |- D = ( deg1 ` R ) |
| 3 |  | deg1addle.r | |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) |
| 4 |  | deg1vsca.b | |- B = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 5 |  | deg1vsca.e | |- E = ( RLReg ` R ) |
| 6 |  | deg1vsca.p | |- .x. = ( .s ` Y ) |
| 7 |  | deg1vsca.f | |- ( ph -> F e. E ) |
| 8 |  | deg1vsca.g | |- ( ph -> G e. B ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mPoly R ) = ( 1o mPoly R ) |
| 10 | 2 | #P_deg1fval | |- D = ( 1o mDeg R ) |
| 11 |  | #P_1on | |- 1o e. On |
| 12 | 11 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> 1o e. On ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( PwSer1 ` R ) = ( PwSer1 ` R ) |
| 14 | 1, 13, 4 | #P_ply1bas | |- B = ( Base ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 9, 6 | #P_ply1vsca | |- .x. = ( .s ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) |
| 16 | 9, 10, 12, 3, 14, 5, 15, 7, 8 | #P_mdegvsca | |- ( ph -> ( D ` ( F .x. G ) ) = ( D ` G ) ) |
